1926254.effect: If this card is in your hand or face-up field (Quick Effect): You can Fusion Summon 1 "Dual Avatar" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material including this card, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Fusion Monsters. If this card or a "Dual Avatar" card(s) is sent to the GY to activate the effect of a "Dual Avatar" Spell/Trap or because it was destroyed by a card effect: You can Special Summon this card from your GY. You can only use 1 "Dual Avatar Ehnlightend Spirit - Ah-Kon" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1926254.name: Dual Avatar Ehnlightend Spirit - Ah-Kon

1928419.effect: (Quick Effect): You can reveal 1 "Dual Avatar" Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck, then send from your Deck to the GY, 1 of the Fusion Materials whose name is specifically listed on that card; this card's name becomes the sent monster's until the End Phase, then if its your opponents turn, destroy 1 card you control. If this card is used as Fusion Material and is now in your GY or banished or a Fusion Monster(s) is Fusion Summoned using a "Dual Avatar" monster as material, while this card is in your GY: You can apply 1 of these effects. ● Special Summon this card in Defense Position, but shuffle it into the Deck when it leaves the field. ● Draw 1 card, then, shuffle this card into the Deck. You can only use 1 "Dual Avatar Engulfed Spirit - Un-Mi" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1928419.name: Dual Avatar Engulfed Spirit - Un-Mi

1926249.effect: If a Fusion Monster(s) is Special Summoned: You can have all "Dual Avatar" monster(s) you control gain 300 ATK/DEF. Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Dual Avatar Spirit Token" (Warrior/LIGHT/Level 2/ATK 0/DEF 0). Once per turn, during the Standby Phase: You can target 1 of your "Dual Avatar" cards that is banished or in your GY; add it to your hand, then, if you have more total cards in your hand and field than your opponent does in theirs, destroy 1 card you control. You can only activate 1 "Dual Avatar Path to Nirvana " per turn.
1926249.name: Dual Avatar Path to Nirvana

1926136.effect:
1 Fusion Monster with 2000 or more DEF + 2 "Dual Avatar" monsters
Monsters your opponent controls lose 200 ATK/DEF for each Fusion Monster on the field. You can only use each of these effects of "Dual Avatar - Engulfed Mi-Gyo" once per turn. 
● If this card is Special Summoned or if a Fusion Monster(s) is Special Summoned while you control this card: You can add 1 "Dual Avatar" card from your GY to your hand.
● If you control a "Dual Avatar" Fusion Monster that was Fusion Summoned using an Effect Monster as material (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card your opponent controls and 1 "Dual Avatar" card or 1 Fusion Monster on the field; destroy them.
1926136.name: Dual Avatar - Engulfed Mi-Gyo

1926133.effect:
1 Fusion Monster with 2000 or more ATK + 2 "Dual Avatar" monsters
During damage calculation, when a "Dual Avatar" monster you control battles: You can have that monster you control or this card gain 500 ATK/DEF. You can only use each of these effects of "Dual Avatar - Enlightened Kon-Gyo" once per turn. 
● If this card is Special Summoned or if a Fusion Monster(s) is Special Summoned while you control this card: You can banish up to 3 cards from your opponents GY face-down. 
● (Quick Effect): You can add to your hand or Special Summon, 1 "Dual Avatar" card from your Deck, then, destroy 1 card you control if you control no other Fusion Monsters.
1926133.name: Dual Avatar - Enlightened Kon-Gyo

1923282.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Trickstar" monster from your hand, but you cannot Special Summon monsters from your hand for the rest of this turn, except "Trickstar" monsters. You can only use this effect of "Trickstar Caladium" once per turn. Each time a card(s) is sent from your opponent's hand to the GY, inflict 200 damage to them for each.
1923282.name: Trickstar Caladium

1922541.effect: The first time each "Trickstar" Link Monster you control would be destroyed by battle each turn, it is not destroyed. Up to twice per turn: You can target 1 "Trickstar" Monster you control; move that monster you control to another of your Main Monster Zones.
1922541.name: Trickstar Stage Planning

1922641.effect: Fusion Summon 1 "Trickstar" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material. If you use a "Trickstar Token" as Fusion Material: You can use 1 "Trickstar" Link Monster in your Extra Deck as material. You can only use this effect of "Trickstar Fusion Debut". You can banish this card from your GY; reveal 3 "Trickstar" Spell/Traps with different names from your Deck, except "Trickstar Light Stage", your opponent picks 1 for you to add to your hand, and you shuffle the rest back into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Trickstar Fusion Debut" once per turn.
1922641.name: Trickstar Fusion Debut

1923255.effect:
If you control a Link 2 or higher "Trickstar" Link Monster when your opponent activates a monster effect: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it, then apply one of the following effects. 
●inflict damage equal to half the original ATK of the monster destroyed by this card's effect.
●increase the ATK of 1 "Trickstar" Link Monster you control by half the original ATK of the monster destroyed by this card's effect.
You can only activate 1 "Trickstar Entrance" once per turn.
1923255.name: Trickstar Entrance

1922555.effect:
2+ "Trickstar" monsters
If your opponent takes battle or effect damage from a "Trickstar" card, except by a card or effect that already inflicted damage to your opponent this turn: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. You can target 1 "Trickstar" Link Monster in your GY; banish "Trickstar" monsters from your GY equal to the targeted monster's Link Rating, and if you do, Special Summon the target to a zone this card points to. You can only use this effect of "Trickstar Bella Chrysanthem"
1922555.name: Trickstar Bella Chrysanthem

1923315.effect:
1 "Trickstar" Link Monster + 1 "Trickstar" monster
You can banish from your Deck, 1 "Trickstar" monster that has an effect that inflicts damage to your opponent, with a different original name than "Trickstar" monsters you control; replace this effect with that monsters effect that inflicts damage to your opponent. When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Trickstar" card from your GY; negate that activation, and if you do, destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Trickstar Wisteria" once per turn.
1923315.name: Trickstar Wisteria

1934462.effect: 2 Level 7 monstersIf this card would be destroyed by an opponent's card, you can detach 1 material from it instead. You can detach 1 material from this card; it gains 2000 ATK. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's original ATK. You can only use each effect of "Razer, the Sky Slashing Dragon" once per turn.

1933786.effect:
2 Level 6 monsters

If this card destroys an opponents monster by battle; you can change control of 1 monster your opponent controls and 1 "Divine Soul Token" you control. If a Normal Monster on the field is destroyed: Gain 1000 LP. You can only use each effect of "Number 182: Spiritous, the Divine Soul" once per turn.

1933820.effect:
2 Level 11 monsters
You can detach any number of materials from this card, then target that many cards on the field: Banish them, but for the rest of the turn, any damage your opponent takes is halved. If this card destroys an opponents monster by battle, look in your opponents Extra Deck; Special Summon 1 monster from it, but its effects are negated, and it loses 500 ATK, and if you do, this card can attack again in a row. During your opponents End Phase, if this card has no material, you can pay 600 LP, then you can attach 1 of your opponents banished cards to this card as material. You can only use each effect of "Number 183: Eternas, Ghoul King of Death" once per turn.

1933842.effect:
2 Level 12 monsters
Once per turn, if an opponent's Xyz Monster battled this turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Number 184: Dreadful Arsenal ZZ-ARES - Abyssal Flames" by using 1 monster you control as material. If Summoned this way: You can attach 1 card from your GY to this card as material. (Quick Effect) Once per Chain, If a card on your opponent's field is sent to the GY, except by your card or effect: You can pay 1000 LP and detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 card on each field; Send them to the GY, also, for the rest of the turn, you cannot target cards of the same type as that target with this effect.. Once per turn, if another card(s) you control is destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect: You can attach 1 card from your hand, Deck, or Extra Deck to this card as material.

1933842.treated_as: Number 184: Dreadful Arsenal ZZ-ARES - Abyssal Flames

1934210.effect:
2 Level 8 monsters
(Quick Effect) You can detach 1 material from this card: Place 1 "Vortex Counter" on another face-up monster you control. If a monster you control with a "Vortex Counter" destroys an opponents monster by battle, you can remove any amount of "Vortex Counters" from field as possible; that monster gains 600 ATK for each counter removed, then Special Summon the destroyed monster from your opponents GY in Attack Position, then that monster can declare another attack in a row. If this card has no materials, you can place 1 "Vortex Counter" on this card. You can only use each effect of "Number 185: Rathalos the Blazing Vortex" once per turn.

2 Level 1 monsters

You can only use this effect of "Number 186: Minute Cybrus" once per turn.

1934237.effect:
2 Level 4 monsters

If a "Gogogo" monster is either Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, or Special Summoned to your side of the field, except by this monsters effect; you can add 1 "Gogogo" monster from your Deck to your hand. 1934254.effect:
2 Level 9 monsters
You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 monster you control: It becomes treated as a Machine Xyz Monster. Machine Xyz Monsters you control cannot be destroyed by Trap cards and their effects. If your opponent activates a Trap card; you can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it, then if this card had no materials when it activated this effect: You can Set that Trap to your side of the field, then your opponent can Set 1 Trap from their Deck to their side of the field. You can only use each effect of "Number 188: Jade Machine Marauder" once per turn.
1934254.name: Number 188: Jade Machine Marauder

1934288.effect:
2 Level 4 monsters

You can only use each effect of "Number 189: Delicious Dragon" once per turn.

1934304.effect:
2 Level 5 monsters
This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each. Your opponent takes no battle damage from battles involving this card. If this card would be destroyed by an opponents card effect; you can detach 1 material from this card instead. If this card has 19 or more materials, you win the duel. You can only use each effect of "Number 190: The 19th Sabre" once per turn. If this card destroys an opponents monster by battle: Attach it to this card as material.

●Special Summon 1 "Summoned Skull" from your hand, and if you do, reduce its Level by 1, then Special Summon 1 "Summoned Token" (Fiend/DARK/Tuner/Level 1/ATK 500/DEF 200).
You can only activate 1 "Summoned Sentiment" per turn.

●Tribute 1 "Summoned Skull" you control, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Archfiend's" Ritual or Fusion Monster from your hand, Deck, or Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Ritual or Fusion Summon, respectively.)

2 Level 5 Monsters

3 Level 2 Monsters

3 Level 3 Monsters

3 Level 1 Monsters

7849.effect: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to your opponent's side of the field in Attack Position, by Tributing 1 monster they control. 1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "Gusto" monsters

1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
